name: circom-poseidon2-hash
description: Poseidon2 hash circuit implementation using circom

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup poseidon2_hash.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_12.ptau poseidon2_hash_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute poseidon2_hash_0000.zkey poseidon2_hash_final.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v
scripts.export-verifier: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey poseidon2_hash_final.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
